column5: Got a new FF Lowrance Elite 7HDI. Gonna mount it on the dash to the right of the steering console. Issue is I will be taking it off & on. Anyone have an Elite 7 that they used some kind of Quick release mount? Been looking at the RAM ones and they have an adapter that snaps right in on the Elite 5 but the Elite 7 uses a gimbal type bracket mount!  Thanks, Mike

I have  that same graph on a ram mount. Comes off fairly quick when you unscrew it,  it just pops off the ball, can also take it off the ball mounted to the boat and leave the arm attached to the graph, have my HDS mounted the same on the dash but with the bigger ram mount  Cheapest I found when I looked http://www.gpscity.ca/ram-mount-rectangular-plate-short-surface-mount-ram-111u-b.html
I also use a ram mount with no issues at all, quick and easy
I have also made setups with the ram mount. Have ball on boat, ATV, and portable battery box for the hut. Works great. Made adapter for 12 cig lighter.
THANKS, that is the kind of answer I am looking for. Mike
A Scotty Universal Sounder Mount may be an option as well.  http://www.amazon.ca/s/ref=nb_sb_noss?url=search-alias%3Daps&field-keywords=scotty+universal+sounder+mount
I have mine setup just like Bondar, works great....make sure you use the right size mount, or you may get some slippage, but otherwise I've been very happy
